title: Data management plan for the ON LiMiT dietary intervention study
description: ON LiMiT (Optimal Non-pharmacological Lifestyle Modifications in people with Type 2 diabetes) is a large Danish intervention study investigating the maintenance of remission of type 2 diabetes through weight loss, diet, and exercise. The project runs from 2025 to 2030 and will involve 1,500 participants with type 2 diabetes. This contains the data management plan for the study.
